titleEs: Webteca Inclusiva. &#xa; Website

excerptCa: Disseny i desenvolupament del website “Webteca Inclusiva” per a [Down Catalunya](https://www.sindromedown.cat/ca/). Plataforma de consulta i d’intercanvi de material educatiu adaptat, que facilita el camí cap a l’escola inclusiva.


excerptEn: Design and development of the “Webteca Inclusiva” website for [Down Catalunya](https://www.sindromedown.cat/en/). Platform for consultation and exchange of adapted educational material, which facilitates the path towards an inclusive school.

excerptEs: Diseño y desarrollo del website  “Webteca Inclusiva” para [Down Catalunya](https://www.sindromedown.cat/es/).  Plataforma de consulta e intercambio de material educativo adaptado, que facilita el camino hacia la escuela inclusiva.
